detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave containing some linen with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the top. Decorative buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with front and back pockets, a fake fly with a button, and tapered legs.
Jumpsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a smocked bodice, wide, tie-top shoulder straps, a high waist and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Trousers in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave. Paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-on fabric belt at the front, and gently tapered, 3/4-length legs.
